Teaching

Math 18500/53 Mathematical Methods in the Physical Sciences III

Syllabus: See Canvas.

  • Regular Class: MWF 12:30-1:20 pm @ Hinds Lab Geo Sci 184
  • My Office Hour: T 9:30-11:00 am, Th 3:30-5:00 pm @ Eckhart 318
